heading.title: Title heading

foreground.title: Icon color
foreground.description: The color for the visual header icons

showCommentButton.title: Comment button
showCommentButton.description: Select to show comment indicator button. Changes to the visual header icon's visibility will only be applied in reading view.

showCopyVisualImageButton.title: Copy icon
showCopyVisualImageButton.description: Turn on the copy icon to allow people in reading view to copy visuals and paste them elsewhere

showDrillDownExpandButton.title: Expand to next level icon
showDrillDownExpandButton.description: Select to turn on expand to next level icon. Changes to the visual header icon's visibility will only be applied in reading view.

showDrillDownLevelButton.title: Show next level icon
showDrillDownLevelButton.description: Select to turn on show next level icon. Changes to the visual header icon's visibility will only be applied in reading view.

showDrillRoleSelector.title: Drill on dropdown
showDrillRoleSelector.description: Select to turn on drill on dropdown. Changes to the visual header icon's visibility will only be applied in reading view.

showDrillToggleButton.title: Drill down icon
showDrillToggleButton.description: Select to turn on drill down icon. Changes to the visual header icon's visibility will only be applied in reading view.

showDrillUpButton.title: Drill up icon
showDrillUpButton.description: Select to turn on drill up icon. Changes to the visual header icon's visibility will only be applied in reading view.

showFilterRestatementButton.title: Filter icon
showFilterRestatementButton.description: Turn on the filter icon to show users a summary of the visual-level filters applied to each visual.

showFocusModeButton.title: Focus mode icon
showFocusModeButton.description: Select to turn on focus mode icon. Changes to the visual header icon's visibility will only be applied in reading view.

showFollowVisualButton.title: Follow visual button
showFollowVisualButton.description: Turn on the follow visual icon to allow people to get alerts whenever a measure changes in the visual. Changes to the visual header icon's visibility will only be applied in reading view.

showOptionsMenu.title: More options icon
showOptionsMenu.description: Select to turn on more options icon. Changes to the visual header icon's visibility will only be applied in reading view.

showPersonalizeVisualButton.title: Personalize visual
showPersonalizeVisualButton.description: Allow report readers to personalize this visual to suit their needs.

showPinButton.title: Pin icon
showPinButton.description: Select to turn on pin icon. Changes to the visual header icon's visibility will only be applied in reading view.

showSeeDataLayoutToggleButton.title: See data layout icon
showSeeDataLayoutToggleButton.description: Select to turn on See Data layout icon. Changes to the visual header icon's visibility will only be applied in reading view.

showSetAlertButton.title: Set alert button
showSetAlertButton.description: Turn on the set alert icon to allow people to create an alert on a measure in the visual. Changes to the visual header icon's visibility will only be applied in reading view.

showSmartNarrativeButton.title: Smart narrative
showSmartNarrativeButton.description: Select to turn on smart narrative icon.

showTooltipButton.title: Visual header tooltip icon
showTooltipButton.description: Select to show the visual header tooltip icon

showVisualErrorButton.title: Visual error icon
showVisualErrorButton.description: Select to turn on visual error icon. Changes to the visual header icon's visibility will only be applied in reading view.
